content:
Meeting Goals

Meeting Goals

  • Determine the overall goal of the group
    • Membership criteria
  • Establish criteria for completeness of the group's work
  • Determine deliverables with target dates
  • Expected amount of W3C resources which the WG will take to run
  • Commitments from non-W3C staff upon which the running of the WG is predicated.
